text: 13.74 Basements being used for sleeping accommodation is classified as a highly vulnerable use, as per Annex 3 of the NPPF, and as such will not be permitted within Flood Zone 3 or within the tidal breach flood extent. This is in line with Table 2 of the PPG for Flood Risk and Coastal Change. Furthermore, sleeping accommodation will not be permitted below the 126 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES tidal breach flood level, in line with national planning policy.
